description:
Upon hearing Irie tell his story, Tsuna becomes fully aware of just how important their battle was. They lost the battle that was their only hope of defeating Byakuran. While Tsuna is in despair, Byakuran comes to steal their Vongola Rings as if to hit him while he’s down. Will the 7³ Policy fall into Byakuran’s hands? Irie brings up a promise from the past, and he asks to play another game of Choice. Byakuran claims they never made such a promise, but just then, an unexpected visitor appears before them.
Source: crunchyroll
